original_text: But none of them says, “I want God to help me. He made me. He gives me songs to sing in dark nights. But none of them says, “I want God to help me. He made me. He gives me songs to sing in dark nights. But none of them says, “I want God to help me.
korean_text: 나를 지으신 하나님은 어디 계시냐고 하며 밤에 노래를 주시는 자가 어디 계시냐고 말하는 자가 없구나

sentences.original_text: who gives songs in the night
